name: Song of Hoop and Wire
description:
Submission for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 107
Theme: Don't Touch it!
Play as the amazing Jericho as he flies through an electric wire on his Hoop-a-copter!
Make sure you don't touch the wire or GET TOASTED!!PS. DO NOT go left no matter what you do!

Meet the Team:
Sound and MusicDiscord: Shanika'Neeko'Freeman#0813Art:Discord: Birdy Boi#3513, Pleinair#7635Dev Team:adwitr, sid, origreenleaf
